links.title: 25 Unstoppable Stocks to Buy No Matter What
links.description: There is a lot of noise in the stock market when hunting for stocks to buy. Every day, discrete events send stocks up and down. These discrete events can be company-specific, like earnings reports, murmurs about mergers and acquisitions, analyst upgrades and downgrades, or investor presentations.

message.body: Could Prime Day Nudge Amazon Past the $1 Trillion Mark? http://bit.ly/2LgsENe $AMZN $AAPL $GOOGL $MSFT $FB #primeday @amazon

links.title: Could Prime Day Nudge Amazon Past the $1 Trillion Mark?
links.description: The summer's 'Black Friday' is just around the corner. That's Amazon ( AMZN) Prime Day, Amazon's fourth-annual sales extravaganza. And it's actually a day and a half this year, running 36 hours total and beginning on July 16 at 3 p.m. ET. Need some new PC games? A few avocados from Whole Foods?

links.title: Why All 5 FAANG Stocks Are Destined to Stay Hot for the Rest of 2018
links.description: Investors in the popular FAANG acronym shouldn't let a harsh market reaction to mixed earnings from component Netflix ( NFLX) shake their confidence. Piper Jaffray analyst Michael Olson continues to expect the FAANG complex to outperform for the rest of 2018.

$AAPL CLOSES ABOVE ITS OPENING PRICE AFTER RECOVERING FROM EARLY SELLING PRESSURE: https://techniquant.com/reports/stock-aapl-daily-technical-analysis-report-for-2018-07-23/

links.title: AAPL closes above its opening price after recovering from early selling pressure
links.description: Highlights Report Sentiment: 42% Bullish Overview AAPL finished Monday at 191.61 edging higher $0.17 (0.09%) on low volume. Trading up to $1.12 lower after the open, Apple managed to reverse during the session as bulls took control ending the day above its opening price.
